factions.name: Germany
additionalRules: Blitzkrieg - German Regular and Veteran Officers issue an additional order when making a 'Snap to Action'; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition German Army Book: Pg. 22
Hitler's Buzz Saw - German Light and Medium MGs fire 1 Extra Shot; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition German Army Book: Pg. 22
Initiative Training - German Infantry and Artillery Units do not suffer -1 to Morale when losing their Squad/Team Leader; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition German Army Book: Pg. 22

Panzer Ace - A Single Select Veteran Vehicles may be taken as a Panzer Ace. Main Gun receives an additional +1 to Pen and +1 to Rolls on the Damage Table; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition German Army Book: Pg. 22

factions.name: Great Britain
additionalRules: Artillery Support - When rolling on Smoke/Arty Barrage Table, roll two dice and pick highest result; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition Great Britain Army Book: Pg. 22
Come on, Lads! - British Officers increase Morale Bonus by 1. Reduce their cover save they might receive by 1; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition Great Britain Army Book: Pg. 22
Fix Bayonets! - For every three models in a unit involved in Close Quarters, add an Additional die when rolling to damage; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition Great Britain Army Book: Pg. 22
For King and Country - Select Units gain the ability to be Guards, Commandos, Airborne, and Chindits; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition Great Britain Army Book: Pg. 22

factions.name: Sweden
additionalRules: 120 Years of Peace - Each Platoon may only include 1 unit of Veteran Experience Level, excluding Officers. Any Inexperienced Unit gains the Green Rule for Free; Communiy Rules
Det Fria Kriget - Select Units gain access to Det Fria Kriget. For 2pt a Model, you may give any Regular or Veteran Unit Engineers and Fieldcraft; Communiy Rules

Sweden wants to defend itself, can defend itself, and must defend itself! - Before an order test, if a unit has at least a pin, that unit may test to remove a pin before the order test; Communiy Rules
The Callup - This unit does not apply the -1 penalty to hit for being Inexperienced; Communiy Rules

factions.name: United States of America
additionalRules: Air Superiority - Forward Air Observers can call in an Additional Air Strike per Game; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition United States of America Army Book: Pg. 24
By Air, Land, and Sea - Select Units gain the ability to be Airborne, Marines, or Rangers; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition United States of America Army Book: Pg. 25
Fire and Manuever - For every three models in a unit with a rifle/carbine equipped, add an Additional die when that unit shoots; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition United States of America Army Book: Pg. 24
Modern Communications - This unit does not apply the -1 penalty when coming out of Reserves; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition United States of America Army Book: Pg. 25
